pages.text: 7|105|samoromy samreab khnhom noh  ku khnhom min niyeay avei ampi a l laoh  krawpi karpit laey .  pitabrakd nasa  khnhom ban neamk aoy anak nouv  phosdo tang da chbasaleasa pi mcheasa robsa anak  dau che  neah saum anak me tda daoh  leng ambaur aisreael aoy thveudamnaer chakchenh tow cheamuoy khnhom phng .
7|106|hvie r aon ban niyeay tha  brasenbae anak ban noam  phosdo tang mk men  chaur anak bangheanh vea mk  brasenbae anak sthet knong  chamnaom anak del niyeay pitmen noh .
7|107|banteabmk mou sa ban baoh dambng robsa ke  rompechnoh vea ka  klaytowchea satv psa yeang pitabrakd .
7|108|haey mou sa kaban dakdai robsa ke( chenhpi haobaw)rompech  noh vea ka klaycha ponlu pnrsa chengchang samreab anakatossaana teangoasa .
7|109|puok medoeknoam nei krom hvie r aon ban niyeay tha tam pit  nih kreante chea anak montoaeakm da statchomneanh bonnaoh .
7|110|ke chng b ne  d nh puok anak chenhpi tukdei robsa puok anak . ( hvie r aon ban suor tha)  dau che  neah tae puok anak trauv aoy khnhom thveu dauchamtech
7|111|puokke ban chhlaey tha  saum anak ponyearpel aoy ke  ning bng  baaun robsa ke sen choh  haey saum anak banhchoun mnoussa tow krob tikrong  daembi bramoul( anak cheh brae montoaeakm teangoasa) .
7|112|puokke nung neamk aoy anak nouv real anak cheh montoaeakm del  statchomneanh bamphot .

7|113|puok del brae montoaeakm teangoasa ban mokadl hvie r aon  haey puokke ban niyeay tha  pitabrakd nasa  tae mean rongvean samreab  puok yeung der ryyte  brasenbae puok yeung chea anak ttuol chychomneah noh
7|114|ke( hvie r aon) ban chhlaey tha  pitchea mean.  haey pit  brakd nasa  puok anak nung sthet knongchamnaom anak chomnit( robsa yeung) .
7|115|puokke( kroumontoaeakm) ban niyeay tha  ao mou sa.  tae anak  baoh( dambng robsa anak)moun  ryy puok yeung baoh moun

7|116|ke( mou sa) ban chhlaey tha  chaur puok anak baoh moun choh. now  pel del puokke ban baoh haey noh  puokke ban brae montoaeakm  bamphean phnek mnoussa( thveu aoy meulkheunh dambng  ning khsae tha chea satv psa  da thom)  haey ban thveu aoy puokke( mnoussa)phyokhlach  ning ban neamk nouv  montoaeakm da aschary .
7|117|yeung ban phdal vea hi towkean mou sa tha  chaur anak baoh dambng  robsa anak tow. ( mou sa kaban baoh dambng) rompechnoh vea ka tow leb  avei  del puokke kampoung bamphean noh .
7|118|banteabmk  karpit kaban lechlaeng  haey avei del puok  ke ban thveu kmean brasetthphap laey .
7|119|dau che  neah puokke trauv ban breachy now tinoh  haey puokke ( hvie r aon ning bri vea) kaban chakchenh daoy ameasa bamphot .
7|120|haey puok del brae montoaeakm teangoasa noh ka lomaon  kay saou chout .
